Description:
Show when private keys are being exported from the device, or when new certificates are installed

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Crypto Commands
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%crypto pki export%' or log like '%crypto pki import%' or log like '%crypto pki trustpoint%')
